name: Karl Urban Legends
description:
A old-school SNES-style sidescrolling shoot 'em up - where you play as the one and only Karl Urban. Can you defeat the boss? Can you be the law? Can you be an Urban Legend?

Play-testing:

Play on Let's Get Itchy channel:

Originally made for Portland Pigsquad's Summer Slow Jams - Urban Legends theme.

Fun Fact: Yup! The city in the background is in the Pearl in downtown Portland, generated from real-time map data from MapBox. The game starts just outside of the Vacasa offices on NW 13th Ave and Lovejoy, and by the boss fight on level 1 you end up near 10 Barrel Brewing.
